mdRecord.dcterms:title: New Jersey Room, Mount Vernon Mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the south wall of the blue room at Mount Vernon. The view includes the fireplace, a portion of the bed and furnishings. The following text is printed directly onto the reverse of the cardboard mount: New Jersey Room, Mount Vernon Mansion. Copyrighted by the Mount Vernon Ladies' Union Association. Luke C. Dillon, Authorized Photographer, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penna. Avenue, Washington City, D. C. A handwritten note on the reverse reads, 'Received from Mrs. Cabot Vice Regent for Massachusetts January, 1953.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion interior
p Blue room
